text: Jonathan Haze (April 1, 1929 - November 2, 2024) was an American actor. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He was best known for his work in Roger Corman movies, especially the 1960 black comedy cult classic, The Little Shop of Horrors, in which he played florist's assistant Seymour Krelboyne. Haze died at his home in Los Angeles, California on November 2, 2024 at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Jonathan Haze
